events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your online store, but I would like to request a refund as the size does not fit me properly.
The customer issue has been identified as a refund request due to sizing problems with the jacket.
An available customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund case promptly.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you'd like to request a refund for your recent jacket purchase.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm whether the product has been opened or worn?
My order number is 987654321, and the jacket is brand new, still with tags attached. I just tried it on once.
We can proceed with your refund. Please send back the jacket using the prepaid return label we've emailed you.
Thank you! I received the return label and will ship the jacket back tomorrow.
Your return has been received, and the refund processed. The amount should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to ensure your refund was received without any issues. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Since we haven’t heard back, we’re closing this case. Thank you for choosing our service, and we hope to assist you again soon.
